BRUNCH

This is supposed to be the lunch part of brunch. Expect breakfast food too.

ENTREES

bbq pulled pork

smoked tofu & bbq eggplant

SIDES

mustard braised collard greens

seasonal steamed vegetables

creamy mac & cheese

performance bar

pasta marinara
